title: Hobbing a spur gear. Part II. Setting up and hobbing the wor
creator_credit: F.E. Brooker and Emerson Yorke Studio
brief_description: How to select and mount the hob; how to set the swivel head angel; how to choose and mount the fixture; how to lead the gear blanks; how to set up for depth trial cut; and how to adjust full depth of cut.
